Columbia has continuously received funding from ExxonMobil between 2016 and 2021, with most of the donations going to the Center on Global Energy Policy

ExxonMobil has directly given money to Columbia’s Center on Global Energy Policy at the School of International and Public Affairs for purposes of public information and policy research and also provides financial support to many higher education institutions through its Educational Matching Gift Program. In 2018, CGEP hosted a roundtable to discuss India’s energy sector, in which Exxon provided further funding.

$400,000

Donations to CGEP

through ExxonMobil

Educational Matching Gift

Program
